pages.title: Nether Fungi
pages.text: The Nether is no stranger to tree-like flora. Immense crimson fungi populate the crimson forests, while their warped fungus cousins can be found in the elusive warped forest.$(br2)Bright bulbs of shroomlight generate underneath both of them, lighting up the gloomy undergrounds.

The caps from these fungi can be harvested from sprouting shrooms in the crimson and warped forests. They can be planted on their respective nylium and given a spark of bone meal to grow more.$(br2)Once the tree has started growing, it is not required to continue using bone meal for the tree to reach maturity.
